entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: New @politico op-ed by @stevenberry + me. We argue that Congress is grossly underfunding efforts to combat Covid-19 & that White House's wish it away strategy won't work. We need humility - we don't know what will work, so we should fund redundant programs https://t.co/xOZRw23CoX
